list.abs: 板块构造学说(Plate tectonics)是在大陆漂移学说和海底扩张学说的基础上提出的。根据这一新学说，地球表面覆盖着不变形且坚固的 …
tectonic unconformity 构造不整合tectonic valley 构造谷tectonic window 地窗
地震的成因与类型根据地震的形成原因,地震可分为构造地震、火山地震、陷落地震和诱发地震等四种类型。 (一):构造地震(Tectonic Earthquake) 由构造运动所引发的地震.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in sense 2): via late Latin from Greek tektonikos, from tektōn 'carpenter, builder'

entry.tran: 地质构造的;地壳构造的
entry.def: Tectonic means relating to the structure of the earth's surface or crust.

example.ex: ...the tectonic plates of the Pacific region.
example.tran: 太平洋地区的地壳构造板块

means.word_mean: 1. pertaining to the structure or movement of the earth's crust;
2. of or pertaining to construction or architecture
